ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kunark Trainers?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t know if this is true of all the trainers but at least the rogue trainer doesn t offer training in all skills. Our rogue was bound there so we
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
>

>
> I'm not sure if I found a cleric trainer either, but I definitely
> found one
> for all the 'good' INT casters, ranger, rogue, shaman, and paladin.
>

I don't know if this is true of all the trainers but at least the rogue
trainer doesn't offer training in all skills. Our rogue was bound there so
we dueled him off so he could train up picklock to 200 real quick one night.
He ended up having to die a real death so he'd have time to gate to misty
thicket and go to the rogues guild in Rivervale because the rogue trainer in
FV doesn't offer picklock training...

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 51 Minstrel of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
